625.question: Does the algorithm improve on the state-of-the-art methods?
625.response: {'Answer': 'From Table 2, it can be seen that the stacked model (NB+Lexicon) achieves the best F1 score of 98.04 on the NCHLT dataset, outperforming the previous state-of-the-art model (Joulin et al., 2017) by 1.44%. From Table 3, it can be seen that the stacked model (NB+Lexicon) also achieves the best performance of 7.4 requests/sec on the NCHLT dataset, outperforming the previous state-of-the-art model (Duvenhage et al., 2017) by 3.1 requests/sec.'}
625.answer: From all reported results proposed method (NB+Lex) shows best accuracy on all 3 datasets - some models are not evaluated and not available in literature.
